name: snowflake-sql-validator
description: Snowflake SQL validator for React applications

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run publish:public
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish:public
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run publish:public
scripts.release:preview: npm run build && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.check-all: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
